Package me.zpath

Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
me.zpath.Configuration
public class Configuration extends Object
The Configuration is a shared resourece which configures how ZPath expressions and ZTemplates are handled.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    Configuration.Logger
    A Logger can be used to log parsing and evaluation of a ZPath, for debugging

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

    • setTemplateMaxOutputSize

      public Configuration setTemplateMaxOutputSize(long maxbytes)
      Set the maximum number of bytes that can be written by a ZTemplate before it fails.
      Parameters:
      maxbytes - the maximum number of bytes that can be written by a template, which defaults to 10485760 (10MB)
      Returns:
      this

    • getTemplateMaxOutputSize

    • setTemplateHTMLEscape

      public Configuration setTemplateHTMLEscape(boolean htmlEscape)
      Set whether ZTemplates should escape any ZPath string expresions in a way that makes them suitable for HTML. The default is true
      Parameters:
      htmlEscape - whether to escape Strings written to the output to make them suitable for HTML
      Returns:
      this

    • isTemplateHTMLEscape

      public boolean isTemplateHTMLEscape()
      Return the "HTML escape" flag as set by setTemplateHTMLEscape(boolean)
      Returns:
      the HTML escape flag

    • setTemplateIncluder

      public Configuration setTemplateIncluder(Includer includer)
      Set the Includer to use when including content into ZTemplates created by this Configuration. The default is null.
      Parameters:
      includer - the includer, or null to disallow inclusions.
      Returns:
      this
